b'Threats to #KanhiyaLal over several days , a written complaint to the police on 15th June, a forwarded Facebook post on Nupur Sharma shared by the tailors young son and a warning of being buried alive . Chilling details in our ground report from #Udaipur by @hrishirajanand_ https://t.co/U8Wvo8okpR'

b'For any one who has reported on or worked in counter terrorism -What Gos Mohd & Riaz have done to Kanhiaya Lal in #Udaipur - the video, the beheading, the boasting - mind goes back to Daniel Pearl- this is way more than radicalism on camera, it is chillingly brutal and organised'

b'Many of you asked me why I wrote \xe2\x80\x9cwhoever did this\xe2\x80\x9d - the names of Gos Mohd & Riaz were not officially known to me at that time & my emphasis was on calling out the grotesque video as an act of terrorism which is what it is . To distort the tweet is mischievous and malevolent'

b'Many of you asked me why I wrote \xe2\x80\x9cwhoever did this\xe2\x80\x9d - the names of Gos Mohd & Riaz were not officially known at the time and my emphasis was on calling out what I saw on the grotesque video as an act of terrorism which It is . To distort this tweet is mischievous and malevolent'

b'Udaipur has crossed the distance from hate speech to hate crime and traveled into the terrain of terrorism .. the video is the tell tale sign. We are now dealing with an entirely different order of law and order challenges and Gos Mohd and Riaz must be tried as terror accused'
b'@TVMohandasPai @sardesairajdeep Yes actually I was the first person to call out the MIM MP but that won\xe2\x80\x99t suit your narrative Mohan !'

b'@Arpita_Badajena Ms Badajena I called it out as terrorism before it was officially treated such by the government , the names of the men were released later . I would suggest you stop playing with fire here and as a political functionary behave in a more responsible fashion . You owe it to India'

b'Gos Mohd & Riyaz,  men arrested in #Udaipur & now verified to be same men boasting on a grotesque video about killing Kanhaiya Lal on camera for supporting Nupur Sharma are faces of terror- their video brandishing knives and smiles are trademark Terrorism https://t.co/Mh5Mf7viXP'
b'@khanruhi @Asma_KhanLDN @Darjeelingldn \xf0\x9f\x92\x9c'
b'All set for an evening of Books and Bhelpuri with @Asma_KhanLDN @ThisisMallika in london at the iconic Darjeeling Express \xf0\x9f\x92\x9c https://t.co/EzE5eeN7ZR'
b'@mjavinod Thanks sir it\xe2\x80\x99s horrifying'

b'To be clear whoever did this - it\xe2\x80\x99s an act of terrorism- the tell tale signs are in that later video brandishing knives and a cold cold smile - the police and Gehlot govt should share more details in public to avoid speculations and contain an inflammable situation #Udaipur'

b'@arjunbirsahi That\xe2\x80\x99s true , but I have seen these murderous men on video without much information about who they are - and I\xe2\x80\x99ve learnt as a journalist to sound that disclaimer till more facts are officially released . It doesn\xe2\x80\x99t change the essence of my argument and disgust'
b'@ShivamVahia The murder and beheading is verified in afraid I have not heard an official account of the men who posted the video - if you have more information than me, do share'

b'The #Udaipur video - if verified - is akin to well organised terrorist videos of boastful \xe2\x80\x9ccredit\xe2\x80\x9d taken for beheadings; one has seen these while reporting insurgencies and conflicts over the years, it has that trademark'
